001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.utils;
002
003import java.util.Timer;
004import java.util.TimerTask;
005
006public class PollingHelper {
007
008    private int countdownInterval = 5000;
009
010    private static PollingHelper instance;
011
012    private Timer mTimer;
013
014    public static PollingHelper getInstance() {
015        if (instance == null) {
016            instance = new PollingHelper();
017        }
018        return instance;
019    }
020
021    public void startPolling(PollingHelperListener listener, int countdownInterval) {
022        this.countdownInterval = countdownInterval;
023        startPolling(listener);
024    }
025
026    public void startPolling(PollingHelperListener listener) {
027        startTimer(listener);
028    }
029
030    public void stopPolling() {
031        if (mTimer != null) {
032            mTimer.cancel();
033            mTimer = null;
034        }
035    }
036
037    private void startTimer(PollingHelperListener listener) {
038        mTimer = new Timer();
039        mTimer.scheduleAtFixedRate(new TimerTask() {
040            @Override
041            public void run() {
042                listener.onTick();
043            }
044        }, 0, countdownInterval);
045    }
046
047    public interface PollingHelperListener {
048        void onTick();
049    }
050
051}
